1.title: Mud (Hastl'ishnii)/Mobilize

episode of.title: Native Shorts Presented by Sundance Institute's Native American and Indigenous Program (TV Series 2013–2019)

1.plot: The short films Mud (Hastl'ishnii) and Mobilize are presented.

2.title: Nuuca

episode of.title: Native Shorts Presented by Sundance Institute's Native American and Indigenous Program (TV Series 2013–2019)

2.plot: The short film Nuuca is presented and discussed.

3.title: Visions of an Island

episode of.title: Native Shorts Presented by Sundance Institute's Native American and Indigenous Program (TV Series 2013–2019)

3.plot: The short film "Visions of an Island" by Sky Hopinka is presented and discussed.

4.title: I Like Girls/My Father's Tools

episode of.title: Native Shorts Presented by Sundance Institute's Native American and Indigenous Program (TV Series 2013–2019)

4.plot: The short films "I like Girls" by director Diane Obomsawin and "My Father's Tools" by Heather Condo are presented and discussed.

5.title: Jaaji Approx./The Violence of a Civilization Without Secrets

episode of.title: Native Shorts Presented by Sundance Institute's Native American and Indigenous Program (TV Series 2013–2019)

5.plot: The short films "Jaaji Approx." by Sky Hopinka and "The Violence of a Civilization Without Secrets" by Adam and Zach Khalil are presented and discussed.

6.title: The Grandfather Drum

episode of.title: Native Shorts Presented by Sundance Institute's Native American and Indigenous Program (TV Series 2013–2019)

6.plot: The short film "The Grandfather Drum" by Michelle Derosier is presented and discussed.

7.title: Mino Bimaadiziwin/Shinaab Part 1

episode of.title: Native Shorts Presented by Sundance Institute's Native American and Indigenous Program (TV Series 2013–2019)

7.plot: The short films "Mino Bimaadiziwin" by Shane McSauby and "Shinaab, Part 1" by Lyle Corbine, Jr. are presented and discussed.

8.title: Nutag-Homeland/I Am Thy Weapon

episode of.title: Native Shorts Presented by Sundance Institute's Native American and Indigenous Program (TV Series 2013–2019)

8.plot: The short films "Nutag-Homeland" by Allisi Telengut and "I Am Thy Weapon" by Razelle Benally are presented and discussed.

imdb.title: Native Shorts Presented by Sundance Institute's Native American and Indigenous Program
akas: Native Shorts Presented by Sundance Institute's Native American and Indigenous Program (United States)
plot: Anthology series consisting of short films by Native creators, introduced by the head of the Sundance Institute's Native American and Indigenous Filmmakers Program.
